name: @dxc-technology/halstack-angular
description: DXC Angular CDK (Component Development Kit) based on Graphen Design System

scripts.post-build-lib: cp -R ./src/assets ./../../dist/dxc-ngx-cdk/lib/assets && npm run copy-styles-lib && npm run copy-md-lib
scripts.generate-lib: npm run build-lib && npm run post-build-lib && npm run package
scripts.generate-lib-prod: npm run build-lib-prod && npm run post-build-lib && npm run package
scripts.generate-lib-win: npm run build-lib && npm run post-build-lib-win && npm run package
scripts.generate-lib-prod-win: npm run build-lib-prod && npm run post-build-lib-win && npm run package
